content:
I think someone asked about this before, but I could not find it, so I am asking again..

What would you recommend as resources for people who want to build their own compilers, starting out in the PL field?

I remember someone pointed to a great website/blog, but I could not find it.. Perhaps it is under an obscure name..
#lang-dev on the community discord has tons and tons of resources

If you're looking for a textbook, my favourite is https://www.cs.rochester.edu/u/scott/pragmatics/ -- I have 3e in dead tree. I find that one is a bit less theory-oriented than most, which made it more accessible to me.
